message.name: INF_CONTINUE_HEARING_COMMENTS
message.locale: A new hearing must be scheduled since the previous hearing has been continued.

message.name: ERR_XFV_HEARING_CONTINUE_DATE
message.locale: Hearing can only be continued before the scheduled date of the hearing.

message.name: ERR_FV_HEARING_CONTINUE_STATUS
message.locale: Can only continue a scheduled hearing.

message.name: ERR_FV_HEARING_STATUS_CODE
message.locale: Can only reschedule a hearing with a status of 'Scheduled'.

message.name: ERR_CASESTATUS_NOTAPPROVEDORACTIVE
message.locale: A hearing can only be scheduled if the appeal is active or approved.

message.name: ERR_SCHEDULED_HEARING_EXISTS
message.locale: Cannot schedule a hearing for a case when there is already a scheduled hearing.

message.name: ERR_FV_DATETIME_UNSPECIFIED
message.locale: Hearing date and time must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_OFFICIAL_UNSPECIFIED
message.locale: Hearing official must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_ENDTIME_UNSPECIFIED
message.locale: Hearing end time must be specified.

message.name: ERR_END_TIME_AFTER_SCHEDULED_TIME
message.locale: Hearing end time must be after the scheduled time.

message.name: ERR_FV_OUT_OF_OFFICE_START_TIME
message.locale: Out of office start time must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_OUT_OF_OFFICE_START_TIME_START_TIME
message.locale: Out of office start time must be on or before the hearing start time.

message.name: ERR_FV_OUT_OF_OFFICE_END_TIME
message.locale: Out of office end time must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_OUT_OF_OFFICE_END_TIME_START_TIME
message.locale: Out of office end time must be later than the hearing start time.

message.name: INF_HEARING_ACTIVITY_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing

message.name: INF_HEARINGREVIEW_ACTIVITY_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing review

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_CONFLICT_HEARING_REVIEWER
message.locale: Activity conflict for hearing reviewer for scheduled hearing time.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_CONFLICT_HEARING_OFFICIAL
message.locale: Activity conflict for hearing official for scheduled hearing time.

message.name: INF_HEARING_TASK_COMMENTS
message.locale: Hearing

message.name: INF_HEARINGREVIEW_TASK_COMMENTS
message.locale: Hearing review

message.name: INF_HEARING_TASK_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing must be completed

message.name: INF_HEARINGREVIEW_TASK_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing review must be completed

message.name: ERR_HEARING_USER_ROLE_NAME
message.locale: Hearing Official user name is not specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_DATETIME_INVALID
message.locale: Scheduled date and time of the hearing must not be in the past.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_NOT_SCHEDULED
message.locale: Can only reschedule a hearing review with a status of 'Scheduled'.

message.name: ERR_FV_HEARINGREVIEWER_UNSPECIFIED
message.locale: At least one Hearing Reviewer must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_DATETIME_NOT_CHANGED
message.locale: You must select a different date and time to reschedule the hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_DATETIME_NOT_AFTER_CONTINUEDHEARING
message.locale: The scheduled date of the new hearing must be after the scheduled date of the continued hearing.

message.name: ERR_FV_REVIEWER_UNSPECIFIED
message.locale: At least one hearing reviewer must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_EXPECTED_DATE_SMALL
message.locale: The expected date (%1d) must not be earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_CONTINUANCE_DATE_BEFORE_PREVIOUSCONTINUANCE_DATE
message.locale: The continuance date entered cannot be before the continuance date of a previously continued hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_SAME_SCHEDULEDDATETIME
message.locale: You must not select the same scheduled date and time as an existing completed hearing for this case.

message.name: INF_HEARINGREVIEW_WITNESS_STATEMENT_TASK_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing review submission of witness statements.

message.name: INF_HEARING_WITNESS_STATEMENT_TASK_SUBJECT
message.locale: Hearing submission of witness statements.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGSCHEDULE_XRV_INSUFFICIENT_TIME
message.locale: Unable to schedule the hearing for this slot as the difficulty level requires more time to be allocated than what is remaining. Please select another slot.
